verses.name: Ezekiel 14:16
verses.text: Though these three men were in it, as I live, saith the Lord God, they shall deliver neither sons nor daughters; they only shall be delivered, but the land shall be desolate.

verses.name: Ezekiel 14:17
verses.text: Or if I bring a sword upon that land, and say, Sword, go through the land; so that I cut off man and beast from it:

verses.name: Ezekiel 14:18
verses.text: Though these three men were in it, as I live, saith the Lord God, they shall deliver neither sons nor daughters, but they only shall be delivered themselves.
